Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.server.model.gods

Class God

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.server.model.gods.God
Direct Known Subclasses:
Apollo, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Chronus, Demeter, Hephaestus, Hestia, Minotaur, Pan, Poseidon, Prometheus, Triton, Zeus
public class God
extends java.lang.Object
Generic god, has nothing implemented. Gods can add and remove possible moves from the player's default ones. A specific god can implement one or all of the following methods, according to its ability description.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addBuilds​(java.util.List<BuildAction> builds, java.lang.String player, int workerIndex, MatchModel model)
    Implements god effects that add additional build possibilities, by adding BuildActions to the current list of possible BuildActions.
    void addMoves​(java.util.List<MoveAction> moves, java.lang.String player, int workerIndex, MatchModel model)
    Implements god effects that add additional move possibilities, by adding MoveActions to the current list of possible MoveActions.
    void afterBuild​(java.lang.String player, int workerIndex, MatchController controller, MatchModel model)
    Implements god effects that activate right after a player has built.
    void afterMove​(java.lang.String player, int workerIndex, MatchController controller, MatchModel model)
    Implements god effects that activate right after a player has moved.
    void afterTurn​(java.lang.String player, int workerIndex, MatchController controller, MatchModel model)
    Do something after the current player's turn ends, but before the next player's turn starts.
    void beforeBuild​(java.lang.String player, int workerIndex, MatchController controller, MatchModel model)
    Implements god effects that activate right before a player builds something, but after they move.
    void beforeMove​(java.lang.String player, int workerIndex, MatchController controller, MatchModel model)
    Implements god effects that activate right before a player moves, but after the start of the turn.
    void beforeTurn​(java.lang.String player, MatchController controller, MatchModel model)
    Do something before the current player's turn starts, but after the previous player's turn ends.
    java.lang.String getOwner()
    Get the string id of the player that owns this god
    void removeBuilds​(java.util.List<BuildAction> builds, java.lang.String player, int workerIndex, MatchModel model)
    Implements god effects that remove build possibilities, by removing BuildActions from the current list of possible BuildActions.
    void removeMoves​(java.util.List<MoveAction> moves, java.lang.String player, int workerIndex, MatchModel model)
    Implements god effects that limit the possibility of movement, by removing MoveActions from the current list of possible MoveActions.

    • addMoves

      public void addMoves​(java.util.List<MoveAction> moves, java.lang.String player, int workerIndex, MatchModel model) throws java.io.IOException
      Implements god effects that add additional move possibilities, by adding MoveActions to the current list of possible MoveActions.
      Parameters:
      moves - moves already calculated
      player - moving player
      workerIndex - the index of the worker that's being moved
      model - current match model reference
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there's a connection error

    • removeMoves

      workerIndex - the index of the worker that's being moved
      model - current match model reference
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there's a connection error
